!------------------------------------ Validation of Parameters vmhost/location-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Initialize the AE variable for error check : SET &CHECK# = 0
:IF &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# +1 :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_VSP_WORKGROUP# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# +1 :ENDIF
:IF &CHECK# NE 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "PLEASE PROVIDE EITHER DOMAIN OR WORKGROUP" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR $errors = 1 :ENDIF
!------------------------------------- Prepare New-VM PowerCLI commandlet inputs ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :IF &CHECK# EQ 1 try { ! DECRYPT PASSWORD : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "CONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO $vsp_srv_obj = &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# -Password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD -Force try { ! -----------------------------preparing os customization spec---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Full name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_NAME# $vsp_os_spec = @{'FullName' = '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'}
! Organization name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_ORG_NAME# $vsp_os_spec.Add('OrgName', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#')
! Description : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DESCRIPTION# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DESCRIPTION# $vsp_os_spec.Add('Description', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! Auto Logon count : IF &UC4RB_VSP_AUTO_LOGON# NE 0 $vsp_os_spec.Add('AutoLogonCount', &UC4RB_VSP_AUTO_LOGON#) : ENDIF
! Change SID : IF &UC4RB_VSP_SID# EQ "YES" $vsp_os_spec.Add('ChangeSid', $true) : ENDIF
! Delete Accounts : IF &UC4RB_VSP_ACC_DELETE# EQ "YES" $vsp_os_spec.Add('DeleteAccounts', $true) : ENDIF
! Domain : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN# $vsp_os_spec.Add('Domain', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! Workgroup : IF &UC4RB_VSP_WORKGROUP# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_WORKGROUP# $vsp_os_spec.Add('Workgroup', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! Domain username : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN_USERNAME# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN_USERNAME# $vsp_os_spec.Add('DomainUsername', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! GUI Run Once commands : IF &UC4RB_VSP_GUI_CMD# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_GUI_CMD# $vsp_cmds = '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' $vsp_cmd_list = $vsp_cmds.Split(",") $vsp_os_spec.Add('GuiRunOnce', $vsp_cmd_list) : ENDIF
! License Mode $vsp_os_spec.Add('LicenseMode', '&UC4RB_VSP_LICENSE_MODE#') : IF &UC4RB_VSP_LICENSE_MODE# EQ "PERSERVER" ! License Max Connections : IF &UC4RB_VSP_LICENSE_CONN# NE 0 $vsp_os_spec.Add('LicenseMaxConnections', &UC4RB_VSP_LICENSE_CONN#) : ENDIF : ENDIF
! Product Key : IF &UC4RB_VSP_PROD_KEY# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_PROD_KEY# $vsp_os_spec.Add('ProductKey', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! Time Zone : IF &UC4RB_VSP_TIME_ZONE# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_TIME_ZONE# $vsp_os_spec.Add('TimeZone', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
! Naming Scheme : IF &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_SCHEME# NE "NOTSPECIFIED" $vsp_os_spec.Add('NamingScheme', '&UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_SCHEME#') : ENDIF
! Naming Prefix : IF &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_PREFIX# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_NAMING_PREFIX# $vsp_os_spec.Add('NamingPrefix', '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#') : ENDIF
Write-Host 'Parameters : ' @vsp_os_spec
! Admin password : IF &UC4RB_VSP_ADMIN_PWD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_ADMIN_PWD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD $vsp_os_spec.Add('AdminPassword', $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD) : ENDIF
! Domain password : IF &UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN_PWD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DOMAIN_PWD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD $vsp_os_spec.Add('DomainPassword', $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD) : ENDIF
! OS Customization Spec name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_OS_SPECNAME#
! Action : IF &UC4RB_VSP_ACTION# EQ "CREATESPEC" New-OSCustomizationSpec @vsp_os_spec -Name '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' -OSType 'Windows' -Confirm:$false : ELSE $os_spec = Get-OSCustomizationSpec -Name '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' | where { $_.OSType -eq 'Windows' } if($os_spec.count -ne 1) { throw "No or multiple OS customization spec found or OS customization spec is not Windows type for specified filter(s). Count : $($os_spec.count)" } $os_spec | Set-OSCustomizationSpec @vsp_os_spec -Confirm:$false : ENDIF } finally { try { ! Disconnect from the server if connection is establish : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "DISCONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# } catch { Write-Host 'Unable to disconnect from the server.' Write-Host 'INFO:' $($error[0].Exception.Message) } } } catch { $errors = 1 Write-Host 'ERROR:' $($error[0].Exception.Message) }
:ENDIF !-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** MANAGE WINDOWS OSCUSTOMIZATIONSPEC ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** MANAGE WINDOWS OSCUSTOMIZATIONSPEC ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
